channel.title: [C4D]Pen
channel.description:
I was a bit bored and started a bit of c4d. This is my first object so its not the best or complex
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/pen.jpg[/img] I am pleased with the chrome and shine.
Please tell me how I could improve etc.

item.title: [C4D]Pen
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Not bad at all, good job, i would say the materials need improving, maybe a brushed metal where itâ€™s silver, and some sort of rubber material for the purple, and change the green colour, looks unrealistic.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 19-07-2009, 18:25:03[/size][hr]Ohh and if possible, add it into an actual scene, create a plane underneath the object, and add some lighting to create shadows, makes it look a whole lot better when rendering.

Read full topic
